doc.previous: From the first equation of the Lorentz transformation in terms of coordinate differences
doc.after: it is clear that two events that are simultaneous in frame S satisfying t 0 are not necessarily simultaneous in another inertial frame S satisfying t 0 Only if these events are additionally co local in frame S satisfying x 0 will they be simultaneous in another frame S
